name: GUAR_PMT_SCORE_HB_HX
description: This table contains HB Guarantor Payment Score history items.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCORE_DATE
columns.description: This item will store the date of the score.

columns.name: SCORE
columns.description: This history item will store the self-pay score.

columns.name: AVG_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: This history item will store the average self-pay level for the score.

columns.name: UNCOLL_BALANCE_YN
columns.description: This history item will store if there has been any uncollectable balance.

columns.name: ONLINE_PMT_YN
columns.description: This history item will store if a payment through MyChart or another electronic portal was used for scoring.
